install.name: Tracking - Google Analytics
install.author: Dioscouri
install.description: This plugin automatically inserts Google Analytics tracking code that track sales in the Google Analytics Ecommerce area.

param.name: webid
param.label: Google Analytics UA Code
param.description: Google Analytics UA code, e.g. UA-123456-1. You get this from Google, when you sign in Google Analytics and add new site profile.

param.name: inccategory
param.label: Include product category
param.description: Enable to include product categories to be track.
